text: wiseonjadeul-i midneun jadeul-ege gohamchyeo buleulini jeohuido yeoleobungwahamkke iss-eossji anhneunyo lago hamae midneun jadeul-i sasil-ila geuleona neohui neun neohui seuseulo yuhog-e ppajigo jujeohayeoss-eumyeo uisimhayeoss-euni mu-ighan yogmang-i neohuileul gimanhayeo hananim ui eungbeol-i neohuiege ileuleossnola gimanhaneun jaga hananim-e gwanhayeo neohuileul yuhoghaessnola
